reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan beautifully made, soft, and very comfortable, with one noting it takes the chill right away. The color and style receive positive feedback, and the fit is perfect. Regarding size, while some appreciate the good length, others find it too small.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality and very warm
items.body: Fits well. I take a medium size 8 to 10. Keep in mind when you receive the sweater you’ll need to put your hands and arms up in the sleeves and stretch them out from the inside. You’ll also need to stretch the rest of the sweater. Once you do this it will fit like a charm and look great. I really love the sweater. It’s very good quality, is very warm. And looks very classy. The color is cream. I wear a long sleeve shirt under it. It’s not scratchy. Good length also. Not too long and not too short. Read more
items.author: gahiker

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceeded my expectations.
items.body: Absolutely loving this cardigan by Aran woollen mills, 100% Marino wool, very well made, very comfy, soft and fits perfectly. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just as advertised.
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Need a receipt in package
items.body: Organizational Missing a receipt that has phone number and how to contact. The cape was great, lined and easy to adjust for wear. Thank you. Read more
items.author: Patches

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful. Sized right. Love it.
items.body: Once I saw the cardigan I knew it would be my favorite! Love the color the fit the softness of the yarn. Read more
items.author: Dewies Mom

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Terrific sweater but smells bad
items.body: I ordered this sweater because I had an identical one that my husband brought me from Ireland. I loved it so much I wore a hole in the elbow, and haven't found someone to mend it. So I treated myself to a new sweater. Well, this one smells so horribly I cannot wear it, despite washing and laying it outside to freshen up. My other sweater never smelled like this. The window for return is past, and now I have an expensive smelly sweater that I cannot even keep in my closet. Read more
items.author: Mountain Girl

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Handsome classic. Warm. Great color goes with everything. Will wear this forever.
items.body: A beautiful knitted, warm, heavy woolen Irish sweater, similar to off-white "fisherman sweaters," but in a familiar & practical denim-ish color which goes with everything and doesn't show the slightest smudge. Fits perfectly. Shawl collar works great with scarves. Will wear this forever. Read more
items.author: Angela G.

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Lovely sweater - runs small
items.body: The sweater was gorgeous! Unfortunately, it ran quite small and made me look quite big. Had to return it. Read more
items.author: Mary Hansen

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Natural, Wicker, Derby Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
